text: Paresh Lamba (born 26 June 1966 in Mumbai, Maharashtra) is an Indian fashion designer and business executive, best known for his clothing company, Paresh Lamba Signatures, which is a multi-national company. It makes clothes for both men and women. == Early life and education == Paresh Lamba was born to a Bollywood film producer Ramesh Lamba and his wife Pammi Lamba in Mumbai. They then moved to Jaipur, Rajasthan. He studied at St. Xavier's School, Jaipur and then went to Rajasthan University to complete a business degree. == Career == Paresh originally wanted to become a shoe designer, but moved on to clothes. Paresh started his boutique in 1992. Paresh has had fashion shows in India and Dubai and claims a clientele list which includes Wayne Brady, various Bollywood celebrities, Kannada actors, politicians throughout India, including Chief Ministers, Cricketers, footballers from BFC and various high profiled businessmen. == References == Category:Living people Category:1966 births Category:Indian male fashion designers Category:Artists from Mumbai
title: Paresh Lamba
